mapper.select: SELECT MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'일',day)) "일" ,MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'월',day)) "월" ,MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'화',day)) "화" ,MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'수',day)) "수" ,MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'목',day)) "목" ,MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'금',day)) "금" ,MAX(DECODE(DAY_OF_WEEK,'토',day)) "토" FROM calendar WHERE MONTH = #{month} GROUP BY WEEK_NO ORDER BY WEEK_NO
